note:
Poet, Publisher, Educator old white guy who gets paid to drive around north Florida and take pictures.
Some guy who writes a lot and doesnt make any money from it.
Stands for Civil Rights, equity, Trans/gay rights, fair distribution of the wealth created by workers. if you liberalism doesnt concern itself with racial justice first, i am not interested.
Writes lots of poetry, not to say any of it is worth reading....
You can find most of it here
https://anthonyuplandpoetwatkins.wordpress.com/

fields.name: Education
fields.value: Non degreed educator at Penn, Kelly Writers House, Modpo.org
